title: A GBP account merged with a non-custodial
tooltip: Non-custodial crypto wallets give you complete control and ownership of your funds. Nobody can freeze your assets/withdrawals, block them or take them away.
hero-description: Spend, transfer and exchange your pounds or your crypto indifferently
best-account-text: Get your own IBANs, instant transfers, physical/ virtual cards, and 15+ currencies at the best exchange rates.
brand-your-card: Brand your card with your own NFT
deposit-your-crypto: Where you can deposit all your crypto
deposit-your-crypt-text: Unlimited crypto deposit and withdrawals. Unlimited exchange to GBP, EUR or USD.
cash-or-crypto: In Cash or in Crypto It's up to you!
cash-or-crypto-text: We'll handle the exchange of Crypto and GBP under the hood based on your needs
your-keys-your-assets-text: This is self-custody. Even if Deblock goes down, 100% of your wallet is protected. Your wealth is safe and nobody can freeze it or take it away.
commission-free-text: Unlimited and in perpetuity with our native plan.
live-support-text: Talk to a real human (not a machine). We are here for you.
